title: Troublesome Undead
body:
Troublesome Undead

The room was silent.

But Evan can feel the tension in the air.

The undead body of Eclipse was trembling under the piercing gaze of three shadow undead.

Cough*

"Illusia, what happened to the body of the A rank orc, you and the other two A rank hunters killed?" Evan asked trying to change the subject so that the poor Eclipse can take a breath.

Besides, If he can create a shadow undead from the orc who was able to use lighting, his power will be increased greatly.

"Most of the bodies of the orcs including A rank were collected by the hunter association. If I am not wrong they should have already processed the body of both of the A rank orcs, since the bodies of high rank orcs are quite good for making armour and weapons" Illusia said shattering his hope of getting A rank orc as an shadow undead.

But there was still one thing that made him frown.
